  when(!file.exists(.)~stop('Could not read bibliography!'),

  RefManageR::ReadBib() %>%
  names() %>%
  str_replace_all(pattern='_', replacement='-') %>%
  str_to_lower() %>%
  file.path('publication','academic', .) %>%
  sprintf(fmt='{{< cite page="%s" view="1" >}}\n') %>%
  cat()
